summary: Filter out reads that are over-soft-clipped

arguments.summary: Inverts the results from this filter, causing all variants that would pass to fail and visa-versa.
arguments.name: --invert-soft-clip-ratio-filter

arguments.summary: Threshold ratio of soft clipped bases (leading / trailing the cigar string) to total bases in read for read to be filtered.
arguments.name: --soft-clipped-leading-trailing-ratio

arguments.summary: Threshold ratio of soft clipped bases (anywhere in the cigar string) to total bases in read for read to be filtered.
arguments.name: --soft-clipped-ratio-threshold

description:
Filter out reads where the ratio of soft-clipped bases to total bases exceeds some given value.

 Can choose to filter by number of soft-clipped bases, or by the leading/trailing soft-clipped bases only.
name: SoftClippedReadFilter
